about_the_game:
Pry into the hearts of monsters and people in this bleak monster-taming RPG.

The world is dying. Play as Josef, a young man who has been thrust into the depths of the Void to defeat the vile being that has been draining the world of its life. With the ability to pry into the hearts of monsters, he must gain allies who will assist him on his descent. Experience a branching narrative that seeks to explore the personal morals of in-game characters and your own. How will your decisions affect how Josef sees the world?

Features:


  • A fun and challenging turn-based combat system where you build the perfect party composition and exploit enemy weaknesses and status conditions, inspired by games such as Shin Megami Tensei and Pokemon.
  • Converse, negotiate and solve moral dilemmas with the souls of monsters to recruit them. A unique scenario for each monster!
  • A bleak and depraved story that will challenge the way you think about each character. Make choices to affect how you see these characters. Can you truly judge a person as binary good or evil.
  • Multiple endings to discover. The path to your ending will depend on your personal morals.
  • Replay the game in Blind Prophet Mode, a mode that makes the game more difficult with more permanent gameplay decisions – inspired by popular rules for other monster-taming games (e.g. Nuzlocke).
  • Key metal tracks composed and produced by Jun Mitsui.

Note: This game contains only mild horror elements with creepy imagery. This game contains no gore or jump scares.

This is the first entry to Project: Retched Garden, a collection of monster-taming RPGs where the world dies and the flowers scream.
